value: G Santos Ctr 60 Flinders St, Adelaide, 5000, SA, Australia

1382 - Oil and Gas Field Exploration Services Summary > SANTOS NA (19-12) PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover oil and gas field exploration services. The company is a subsidiary of SANTOS LIMITED. The company is involved in the export but not import of goods. SANTOS NA (19-12) PTY LTD is headquartered in Adelaide, South Australia. It is headed by CEO & managing director Kevin Thomas Gallagher. For the 2023 financial year, the company reported revenue of $38.29 million. Its net profit totalled $17.44 million. SANTOS NA (19-12) PTY LTD forms part of the mining industry sector.
